it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

Class MessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.MessageFactory

  • public class MessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    MessageFactory includes static methods to forge new dhcp request and/or reply messages

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageFactory(DhcpStack dhcpstack)
      Costructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DhcpMessage createDhcpAck(DhcpMessage request, java.lang.String server_addr, java.lang.String assigned_address, java.lang.String mask, long lease_time, java.lang.String router, java.lang.String dns, java.lang.String domain_name)
      Returns a default DHCP_ACK message request : received dhcp request/inform message server_addr : the server address assigned_address: (OPTIONAL) the assigned address (yiaddr) MUST in response to DHCP_REQUEST, MUST-NOT in response to DHCP_INFORM lease_time : (OPTIONAL) lease time in seconds, or 0 MUST in response to DHCP_REQUEST, MUST-NOT in response to DHCP_INFORM mask: (OPTIONAL) the mask, or null router: (OPTIONAL) the router, or null dns: (OPTIONAL) the dns, or null domain_name: (OPTIONAL) the domain name, or null
      DhcpMessage createDhcpAdv(java.lang.String server_addr, java.lang.String nai)
      Returns a default DHCP_ADV message server_addr : the server address nai: the NAI
      DhcpMessage createDhcpDecline(byte[] xid, java.lang.String requested_addr, java.lang.String server_addr)
      Returns a default DHCP_DECLINE message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client requested_addr : requested ip address server_addr : the server address
      DhcpMessage createDhcpDiscover(byte[] xid, java.lang.String requested_addr, long lease_time)
      Returns a default DHCP_DISCOVER message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client requested_addr : (OPTIONAL) requested ip address, or null lease_time : (OPTIONAL) lease time in seconds, or 0
      DhcpMessage createDhcpInform(byte[] xid, java.lang.String ciaddr)
      Returns a default DHCP_INFORM message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client ciaddr : client's network address
      DhcpMessage createDhcpNack(DhcpMessage request, java.lang.String server_addr)
      Returns a default DHCP_NACK message request : received dhcp request message server_addr : the server address
      DhcpMessage createDhcpOffer(DhcpMessage discover, java.lang.String server_addr, java.lang.String offered_address, java.lang.String mask, long lease_time, java.lang.String router, java.lang.String dns, java.lang.String domain_name)
      Returns a default DHCP_OFFER message discover : received dhcp discover message server_addr : the server address offered_address: the offered address (yiaddr) lease_time : lease time in seconds mask: (OPTIONAL) the mask, or null router: (OPTIONAL) the router, or null dns: (OPTIONAL) the dns, or null domain_name: (OPTIONAL) the domain name, or null
      DhcpMessage createDhcpRelease(byte[] xid, java.lang.String ciaddr, java.lang.String server_addr)
      Returns a default DHCP_RELEASE message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client ciaddr : client's network address server_addr : the server address
      DhcpMessage createDhcpRequest(byte[] xid, java.lang.String ciaddr, java.lang.String requested_addr, long lease_time, java.lang.String server_addr)
      Returns a default DHCP_REQUEST message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client ciaddr : (OPTIONAL) client's network address for renew/rebind, or null requested_addr : (OPTIONAL) requested ip address, or null.
      DhcpMessage createMhcpRequest(byte[] xid, java.lang.String server_addr, java.lang.String nai)
      Returns a MHCP_REQUEST message xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client server_addr : the server address nai : the new NAI (from the MHCP ADV)
      protected DhcpMessage createReply(DhcpMessage request)
      Returns a default reply message for the current request
      protected DhcpMessage createRequest(byte[] xid)
      Returns a default request message

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • createDhcpDiscover

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpDiscover(byte[] xid,
                                      java.lang.String requested_addr,
                                      long lease_time)
        Returns a default DHCP_DISCOVER message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        requested_addr : (OPTIONAL) requested ip address, or null

        lease_time : (OPTIONAL) lease time in seconds, or 0

      • createDhcpInform

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpInform(byte[] xid,
                                    java.lang.String ciaddr)
        Returns a default DHCP_INFORM message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        ciaddr : client's network address

      • createDhcpRequest

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpRequest(byte[] xid,
                                     java.lang.String ciaddr,
                                     java.lang.String requested_addr,
                                     long lease_time,
                                     java.lang.String server_addr)
        Returns a default DHCP_REQUEST message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        ciaddr : (OPTIONAL) client's network address for renew/rebind, or null

        requested_addr : (OPTIONAL) requested ip address, or null. MUST in initialization, MUST-NOT in renewing

        lease_time : (OPTIONAL) lease time in seconds, or 0

        server_addr : (OPTIONAL) the server address, or null. MUST after selecting the offer, MUST-NOT in other cases

      • createMhcpRequest

        public DhcpMessage createMhcpRequest(byte[] xid,
                                     java.lang.String server_addr,
                                     java.lang.String nai)
        Returns a MHCP_REQUEST message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        server_addr : the server address

        nai : the new NAI (from the MHCP ADV)

      • createDhcpDecline

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpDecline(byte[] xid,
                                     java.lang.String requested_addr,
                                     java.lang.String server_addr)
        Returns a default DHCP_DECLINE message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        requested_addr : requested ip address

        server_addr : the server address

      • createDhcpRelease

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpRelease(byte[] xid,
                                     java.lang.String ciaddr,
                                     java.lang.String server_addr)
        Returns a default DHCP_RELEASE message

        xid : dhcp transaction id, selected by the client

        ciaddr : client's network address

        server_addr : the server address

      • createDhcpOffer

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpOffer(DhcpMessage discover,
                                   java.lang.String server_addr,
                                   java.lang.String offered_address,
                                   java.lang.String mask,
                                   long lease_time,
                                   java.lang.String router,
                                   java.lang.String dns,
                                   java.lang.String domain_name)
        Returns a default DHCP_OFFER message

        discover : received dhcp discover message

        server_addr : the server address

        offered_address: the offered address (yiaddr)

        lease_time : lease time in seconds

        mask: (OPTIONAL) the mask, or null

        router: (OPTIONAL) the router, or null

        dns: (OPTIONAL) the dns, or null

        domain_name: (OPTIONAL) the domain name, or null

      • createDhcpAck

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpAck(DhcpMessage request,
                                 java.lang.String server_addr,
                                 java.lang.String assigned_address,
                                 java.lang.String mask,
                                 long lease_time,
                                 java.lang.String router,
                                 java.lang.String dns,
                                 java.lang.String domain_name)
        Returns a default DHCP_ACK message

        request : received dhcp request/inform message

        server_addr : the server address

        assigned_address: (OPTIONAL) the assigned address (yiaddr) MUST in response to DHCP_REQUEST, MUST-NOT in response to DHCP_INFORM

        lease_time : (OPTIONAL) lease time in seconds, or 0 MUST in response to DHCP_REQUEST, MUST-NOT in response to DHCP_INFORM

        mask: (OPTIONAL) the mask, or null

        router: (OPTIONAL) the router, or null

        dns: (OPTIONAL) the dns, or null

        domain_name: (OPTIONAL) the domain name, or null

      • createDhcpNack

        public DhcpMessage createDhcpNack(DhcpMessage request,
                                  java.lang.String server_addr)
        Returns a default DHCP_NACK message

        request : received dhcp request message

        server_addr : the server address

                                 java.lang.String nai)
        Returns a default DHCP_ADV message

        server_addr : the server address

        nai: the NAI
